title.narrative: Maono Singida - Sustainable provision of eye care

description.narrative: To contribute to the sustainable provision of eye care services in six districts of Singida region in Tanzania focusing on demand creation and improvements in current delivery mechanisms. The project received a no cost extension as some activities were delayed due to the COVID-19 pandemic.

participating-org.narrative: Ministry of Health, Community Development, Gender, Elderly and Children (MoHCDGEC) - Tanzania
